mapper.select: select data_version as dataVersion from static_risk_data group by data_version order by data_version desc limit 1

SELECT c.company_id as companyId, c.name as name, s.real_control_risk_v2 as realControlRiskV2, s.illegal_financing_risk_v2 as illegalFinancingRiskV2 , s.short_risk_v2 as shortRiskV2, s.illegal_money_financing_risk_v2 as illegalMoneyFinancingRiskV2, s.person_structure_risk_v2 as personStructureRiskV2 , s.relation_in_risk_v2 as relationInRiskV2 FROM company c, static_risk_data s where c.`name`=s.company_name and c.company_type=4 and s.data_version=#{newDataVersion} limit #{pagination.begin}, #{pagination.pageSize}

SELECT c.company_id as companyId, c.name as name, s.real_control_risk_v2 as realControlRiskV2, s.illegal_financing_risk_v2 as illegalFinancingRiskV2 , s.short_risk_v2 as shortRiskV2, s.illegal_money_financing_risk_v2 as illegalMoneyFinancingRiskV2, s.person_structure_risk_v2 as personStructureRiskV2 , s.relation_in_risk_v2 as relationInRiskV2 FROM company c, static_risk_data s where c.`name`=s.company_name and c.company_type=4 and s.data_version=#{newDataVersion} and s.company_name=#{companyName}
SELECT count(1) FROM company_credit_raw_info WHERE company_id = #{companyId} and resource_name = #{resourceName}

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT c.resource_name FROM company_credit_raw_info c, offline_financial_white o WHERE c.company_id = o.companyId AND o.companyId = #{companyId} ) a WHERE a.resource_name = #{resourceName1} OR a.resource_name = #{resourceName2} or a.resource_name = #{resourceName3}

SELECT c.company_id as companyId, c.name as name, s.real_control_risk_v2 as realControlRiskV2, s.illegal_financing_risk_v2 as illegalFinancingRiskV2 , s.short_risk_v2 as shortRiskV2, s.illegal_money_financing_risk_v2 as illegalMoneyFinancingRiskV2, s.person_structure_risk_v2 as personStructureRiskV2 , s.relation_in_risk_v2 as relationInRiskV2 FROM company c, static_risk_data s where c.`name`=s.company_name and c.company_type=4 and s.data_version=#{newDataVersion} and c.company_id=#{companyId}
SELECT DISTINCT(data_version) from static_risk_data WHERE data_version LIKE '%2017%'
